effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil. Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil. Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

short_effect.x_y: User takes 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil. Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: User takes 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil. Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

flavor_text.x_y: The user electrifies itself, then charges. This also damages the user quite a lot. This may leave the target with paralysis.
